the fixed points a and b are 4.2 m apart on a smooth horizontal floor.  one end of a 
light elastic spring, of natural length 1.8 m and modulus of elasticity 20 n, is attached to 
a particle p and the other end is attached to a.  one end of another light elastic spring, of 
natural length 0.9 m and modulus of elasticity 15 n, is attached to p and the other end is 
attached to b.  the particle p rests in equilibrium at the point o, where aob is a straight 
line, as shown in figure 5.
 
(a) show that ao = 2.7 m.
(4)

towards b.  in the subsequent motion p does not reach b.
 
(b) show that p moves with simple harmonic motion about centre o.
(5)

given that p first comes to instantaneous rest at the point c where ac = 2.9 m,
